TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindingCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection
Public NotInheritable Class BindingCollection Inherits ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: Represents a collection of instances of the class supported by the XML Web service.

span.span: Represents a collection of instances of the class supported by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe corresponde para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `` elemento entre pela raiz `` elemento.The class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `` element enclosed by the root `` element. Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o número de itens na coleção já for igual a capacidade da coleção, a capacidade é duplicada, automaticamente realocando a matriz interna antes do novo elemento é inserido.If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. Se o `index` parâmetro for igual ao , o `binding` parâmetro é adicionado ao final do .If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `binding` parameter is added to the end of the . Os elementos após o ponto de inserção se mover para baixo para acomodar o novo elemento.The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[BindingCollectionSample2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionSample2/CPP/bindingcollectionsample2.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[BindingCollectionSample2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionSample2/CS/bindingcollectionsample2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[BindingCollectionSample2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionSample2/VB/bindingcollectionsample2.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método executa uma pesquisa linear; Portanto, o tempo médio de execução é proporcional ao .This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . Os elementos que seguem o removido `Binding` mover para cima para ocupar o ponto vagas.The elements that follow the removed `Binding` move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples [!code-cpp[BindingCollectionsample3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionsample3/CPP/bindingcollectionsample3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingCollectionsample3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionsample3/CS/bindingcollectionsample3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingCollectionsample3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BindingCollectionsample3/VB/bindingcollectionsample3.vb#1)]
